content: crochet scrunchie who doesn t love a velvet scrunchie they are super in right now i fell in love with the bernat velvet yarn and knew that one of things i would have to make is a scrunchie it crochets up super quick and makes a great accessory for yourself or great gifts for friends it is made with a mix of single half double double half treble and treble crochets it is the perfect pattern for beginners who are looking to expand their knowledge of stitches and gain some practice happy crocheting ac original creations @ac original creations /acoriginalcreate 1 difficulty level/skills required this is a beginner crochet project it is the perfect project for crocheters who have mastered or want to learn and practice the single_crochet half-double_crochet double_crochet half treble_crochet and treble_crochet materials yarn bernat velvet ​ 100% polyester 315yds/288m per 10/5oz/300g skein - 1 skein sample uses colour v​ apor gray **note one skein of bernat velvet will make lots of scrunchies hook pattern uses a 9mm hook notions - yarn needle for weaving in ends - hair elastic gauge 8 sts/6 row = 10cm/4 inches square in single_crochet size information finished measurements total scrunchie laying flat length 10cm/4 inches width 10cm/4 inches 2 abbreviations glossary references techniques single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet htc - half treble_crochet tc - treble_crochet how to half_double_crochet yarn over insert hook through stitch pull through 3 loops on hook yarn over pull through first loop on hook yarn over pull through all three loops on hook how to double_crochet yarn over insert hook through stitch pull through 3 loops on hook yarn over pull through first 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through last 2 loops on hook how to half treble_crochet yarn over twice insert hook through stitch pull through 4 loops on hook yarn over pull through first 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through all three loops on hook how to treble_crochet yarn over insert hook through stitch pull through 4 loops on hook yarn over pull through first 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through next 2 loops on hook yarn over pull through last 2 loops on hook pattern notes you will be working the crochet stitches into the hair elastic of your choice after repeating step 1 six times it begins to get a little tight keep pushing the stitches together as it makes a nice bunched look for your scrunchie i crochet over the tail of the slip knot to save sewing it in later method 1 single_crochet *half_double_crochet double_crochet htc tc htc double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet repeat from * 8 more times for a total of 73 stitches around the elastic 2 slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn pull through the last loop on hook finishing weave in ends 3 designer information contact information anastasia @ ac original creations https //www ravelry com/designers/ac-original-creations acoriginalcreations@gmail com copyright statement © ac original creations february 2020 version #1 4
